skills.skill: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, design, develop and deliver large-scale data systems, data processing, and data transformation projects
Automate data platform operations and manage post-production system and processes
Conduct technical feasibility assessments and provide project estimates for the design and development of the solution
Provide technical inputs to agile processes and resolve issues throughout client engagements
Creation and maintenance of infrastructure-as-code for cloud, on-prem, and hybrid environments
Mentor and grow junior team members
